headline: BIO-TECHNE AND ALZpath ANNOUNCE STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP TO ADVANCE NEURODEGENERATIVE DISEASE RESEARCH
summary: Bio-Techne Corporation (NASDAQ: TECH) today announced a strategic partnership with ALZpath, Inc to accelerate breakthroughs in neurodegenerative disease research and treatment, including Alzheimer's disease. The collaboration leverages Bio-Techne's Ella™ fully automated, multiplexing immunoassay platform and ALZpath's proprietary pTau217 antibody to provide the Simple Plex Human Phospho-Tau (T217) ALZpath Assay.
